organisation_name: Fédération Européenne des Cadres de l'Energie et de la Recherche - European Federation of managers and executives in the Energy sector (FECER)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: FECER (http://www.fecer.eu) belongs to the CEC, one of the six cross-industry european social partner (http://cec-managers.eu). Through its national members organisations and professional federations, it represents 1,5 million managers in Europe. This Confederation is affiliated to the CIC (International Managers Confederation)
goals__remit:
- Takes part and make ear the managers voice in the European,social dialogue, related to the energy and research sectors.  
 
- Participates to the european debates relevant to the Energy & Research sectors 
 
- Supports the building of a social Europe toward its experience and skills 
 
- Negociate EWC agreement in supra-national companies
